data.title: Movie Premiere Press Release
data.text:
UNIVERSAL PICTURES AND BRISTOL BAY PRODUCTIONS HOST THE WORLD PREMIERE OF 'RAY,' TUESDAY, OCTOBER 19 AT THE CINERAMA DOME AND ARCLIGHT CINEMAS, HOLLYWOOD.

WHAT: The world premiere of "RAY," the musical biographical drama of

American legend Ray Charles.

WHO: "RAY" cast members Jamie Foxx, Kerry Washington, Regina King,

Clifton Powell, Harry Lennix, Bookeem Woodbine, Aunjanue

Ellis, Sharon Warren, C. J. Sanders, Curtis Armstrong, Richard

Schiff, Larenz Tate, Terrence Dashon Howard, David Krumholtz,

Wendell Pierce, Kurt Fuller, Kimberly Ardison and Renee

Wilson; director/producer/story writer Taylor Hackford;

screenwriter James L. White; and producers Stuart Benjamin,

Howard Baldwin and Karen Baldwin.

Plus, celebrity guests Debbie Allen, Angela Bassett, Peter

Berg, Jason Biggs, Joy Bryant, Dean Cain, Nick Cannon,

Jennifer Esposito, Louis Gossett, Jr., Bonnie Hunt, Ice Cube,

Magic Johnson, Quincy Jones, Matthew McConaughey, Brian

McKnight, Alyssa Milano, Sofia Milos, Lou Diamond Phillips,

Theresa Randle, Doris Roberts, Michelle Rodriguez, Theresa

Rowell, Alicia Silverstone, Will Smith, Rozonda 'Chilli'

Thomas, Courtney Vance, Estella Warren, Marlon Wayans, Shawn

Wayans, Kym Whitley and many others.

WHERE: The Cinerama Dome and ArcLight Cinemas

6360 Sunset Boulevard

WHEN: Tuesday, October 19, 2004

5:30 PM Press Call Time

6:30 PM Celebrity Arrivals

7:30 PM Screening Begins
